changeSet.sql:
create sequence temporary_token_seq; create type etemporarytokentype as enum ('SETUP_2FA_TOKEN', 'LOGIN_TOKEN', 'REGISTRATION_TOKEN', 'EMAIL_TOKEN', 'RESET_PASSWORD_TOKEN','EMAIL_CHANGE_TOKEN', 'PASSWORD_VERIFIED_TOKEN');
create table if not exists temporary_token ( id bigint not null constraint temporary_token_pkey primary key, expiration_time timestamp, temporary_token_type etemporarytokentype, value varchar(255), auth_id bigint constraint temporary_token_fk1_on_auth references auth, constraint temporary_token_uk_on_temporaryTokenType_and_authId unique (temporary_token_type, auth_id) );
